# nexus-slider



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                                                                  | Type      | Default       |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------- | ------------- |
| `attrId`   | `attr-id`  | A unique identifier for the slider and the label to match. If none is provided one will be added by default. | `string`  | `''`          |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Whether the form control is disabled                                                                         | `boolean` | `undefined`   |
| `max`      | `max`      | Maximum length of slider value                                                                               | `number`  | `ONE_HUNDRED` |
| `min`      | `min`      | Minimum length of slider value                                                                               | `number`  | `0`           |
| `required` | `required` | Whether the form control is required                                                                         | `boolean` | `undefined`   |


## Events

| Event             | Description                                        | Type               |
| ----------------- | -------------------------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `_disabledChange` | Internal event for updating disabled form elements | `CustomEvent<any>` |
